def_cn: （与名词连用构成名词或形容词）表示“抨击”，“非难”
def_en: -bashing combines with nouns to form nouns or adjectives that refer to strong, public, and often unfair criticism of the people or group mentioned.

def_cn: （与名词连用构成名词或形容词）表示“暴力对待”，“攻击”
def_en: -bashing combines with nouns to form nouns or adjectives that refer to the activity of violently attacking the people mentioned just because they belong to a particular group or community.
